2.title: Observer
2.desc: Access to sheet but can only purchase items if merchant sheet type

3.title: Owner
3.desc: Manage inventory of the actor, share coins.

lootsheettype.title: Sheet type
lootsheettype.content: <dl><dt>Loot</dt><dd>Allows for distribution of coins across players</dd><dt>Merchant</dt><dd>Allows players to purchase items directly from the sheet.</dd></dl>

permissions.title: Permissions

permissions_individual.title: Individual permissions
permissions_individual.content: üîÅ Click on a character to to cycle the players permission. Hover to see information.

buyItem.name: Buy item
buyItem.hint: Allow players to buy items from the merchant sheet?

chatGracePeriod.name: Chat grace period (seconds)
chatGracePeriod.hint: When updating the chat messages, after this grace period the module will create a new message instead of updating the old one.

colorRarity.name: Colorize rarity?
colorRarity.hint: Use slight color indication to show rarity? (Be aware that this might affect colorblind players)

convertCurrency.name: Convert currency
convertCurrency.hint: Convert currency to the highest denomination possible after a purchase. (e.g. gp to pp)

fallbackCurrencyFormula.name: Default Currency Formula
fallbackCurrencyFormula.hint: Formular to calculate the currency if no other formula was picked up from the actor or population settings. (e.g. '1d6[gp], 2d6[sp], 3d6[cp]')

filterNaturalWeapons.name: Filter natural weapons
filterNaturalWeapons.hint: Filter natural weapons from the inventory?

distributeCurrency.name: Distribute currency
distributeCurrency.hint: Allow players to split currency between the party members?

generateChatMessages.name: Generate chat messages
generateChatMessages.hint: Generate chat messages for looting or transactions.

lootAll.name: Loot all
lootAll.hint: Allow players to loot all items from the sheet ate once. Currency will follow the currency settings.

includeCurrencyWeight.name: Include currency weight
includeCurrencyWeight.hint: Include the weight of the currency in the total weight of the sheet.

lootCurrency.name: Loot currency
lootCurrency.hint: Allow player to loot the currency to their own character.

lootItem.name: Looting
lootItem.hint: Allow players to loot items from the sheet.

maxPriceIncrease.name: Maximum Price Increase
maxPriceIncrease.hint: Maximum price increase for the merchant sheet. (e.g. 200% = 100gp -> 200gp)

reduceUpdateVerbosity.name: Reduce update verbosity
reduceUpdateVerbosity.hint: No notifications will be created every time an item is added to the inventory.

showStackWeight.name: Show stack weight
showStackWeight.hint: Show the weight of the stack next to the indicudual item weight.

stackBuyConfirm.name: Stack buy confirm
stackBuyConfirm.hint: Ask for confirmation before purchasing a stack?

sheetUpdate.name: Force sheet update
sheetUpdate.hint: Send an update to the players that tells there client to refresh the sheet.

tradeItems.name: Trading
tradeItems.hint: Allow players to trade items with the sheet.

useCondensedLootsheet.name: ‚ö†Ô∏è ALPHA Testing Preview ‚ö†Ô∏è Condensed lootsheet
useCondensedLootsheet.hint: Use a condensed styled loothseet. This is to get an idea for potential future theming options.

autoPopulateTokens.name: Auto Populate Tokens
autoPopulateTokens.hint: Automatically roll for loot. If an actor has a rolltable assigned to it, or if Fallbacks are found.

adjustCurrencyWithCR.name: Adjust currency with CR
adjustCurrencyWithCR.hint: Currency will be slightly adjusted by the CR (rollFormula + round up CR).

creatureTypeFallbacks.name: Creature type fallbacks
creatureTypeFallbacks.hint: Fallback rolltables to use if no rolltable is assigned to the actor but the actor macthes this creature type.

lootCurrencyDefault.name: Currency default formula
lootCurrencyDefault.hint: Formula to use  for loot currency generation. (e.g. 1d4[gp], 1d20[sp], 1d50[cp])

fallbackRolltable.name: Fallback Rolltable
fallbackRolltable.label: Fallback rolltable to use if no rolltable is assigned to the actor.

fallbackShopQty.name: Fallback shop quantity
fallbackShopQty.hint: Fallback shop quantity to use if no shop quantity is assigned to the actor. (e.g. 1d6)

fallbackItemQty.name: Fallback item quantity
fallbackItemQty.hint: Fallback item quantity to use if no quantity is assigned to the actor. (e.g. 1d6)

fallbackItemQtyMax.name: Fallback item quantity maximum
fallbackItemQtyMax.hint: Fallback item quantity maxmimum to use if no maxmimum quantity is assigned to the actor. (e.g. 2d20 || 10)

useRulesets.name: Use filter rulesets
useRulesets.hint: Custom rules to test against a token. E.g. if tokens actor matches the rules rolltable will be used instead of a fallback rolltable.

useSkiplist.name: Use skiplist
useSkiplist.hint: Use the skiplist to ignore tokens with checked types during population.

autoCheckUpdates.name: Update Check
autoCheckUpdates.hint: Automatically check for module updates on startup

useBetterRolltables.name: Use better rolltables
useBetterRolltables.hint: If installed make use of better rolltables to update Inventory?
